definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="121" y="-2"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_iscreative"/></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">You are already in creative mode!</field></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="entity_set_gamemode"><field name="gamemode">CREATIVE</field><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Succsefully mode changed to Creative!</field></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
